name: Caral "The Oldest City Of America
description:
Caral is located in the valley of Supe and it is the oldest city of America. It has five thousand years and seven great pyramids.
This is a guided visit to the sacred city of Caral "The oldest city of America". It is the most notable archaeological discovery of the last times. The antiquity of Caral was detected through 18 dated radio carbonic ones made in the USA. This discovery changes the schemes that until now were had on the development of the civilization in Peru
